summary: The implementation successfully addresses all PIN-based folder access control requirements (REQ-13 through REQ-20). Backend storage, hashing, verification endpoint with rate limiting, and frontend PIN setup, verification, change, and reset flows are all implemented with comprehensive English and Hindi translations. Session-based authentication is properly integrated across all folder pages (Photos, Videos, Documents, Memories) with PIN status indicators in the navigation.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module for existing users with empty PIN field initialization
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention or require backward compatibility migration for existing users. REQ-13 only states 'Users can set PIN during profile creation' and 'Users can update their PIN after verification' without specifying migration handling for pre-existing accounts.
